description:
From Bathing Birdies to cannonball competitions, this comfy suit is great for young water lovers. Made from a light and stretchy blend, the Penny dries fast and helps protect against UV.

  • Poly’ spandex blend dries quickly and has plenty of stretch
  • Flatlock seams reduce chafing and irritation
  • UPF 50+ stops more than 98% of harsh UV in its tracks
name: Level Six Penny Thick Strap One Piece - Girls' - Children to Youths
